name: Nepenthe
description: You won't need a haircut where you're going... mostly because you're bald. Inspired by Earthbound, Undertale, and other alt-RPGs, Nepenthe is a hand-drawn game made of dad-jokes and existential dread. Also cookies. Lots of cookies.
minimum_requirements: OS: anything made in the last decade Processor: one that works Memory: 490 MB RAM Graphics: a toaster - you really shouldn't have trouble Sound Card: yes. Additional Notes: make sure your computer is on
